00040 /* CuTest */
00041 
00042 typedef struct CuTest CuTest;
00043 
00044 typedef void (*TestFunction)(CuTest *);
00045 
00046 struct CuTest
00047 {
00048         const char* name;
00049         TestFunction function;
00050         int failed;
00051         int ran;
00052         const char* message;
00053         jmp_buf *jumpBuf;
00054 };
00055 
00056 void CuTestInit(CuTest* t, const char* name, TestFunction function);
00057 CuTest* CuTestNew(const char* name, TestFunction function);
00058 void CuTestRun(CuTest* tc);
00059 
00060 /* Internal versions of assert functions -- use the public versions */
00061 void CuFail_Line(CuTest* tc, const char* file, int line, const char* message2, const char* message);
00062 void CuAssert_Line(CuTest* tc, const char* file, int line, const char* message, int condition);
00063 void CuAssertStrEquals_LineMsg(CuTest* tc, 
00064         const char* file, int line, const char* message, 
00065         const char* expected, const char* actual);
00066 void CuAssertIntEquals_LineMsg(CuTest* tc, 
00067         const char* file, int line, const char* message, 
00068         int expected, int actual);
00069 void CuAssertDblEquals_LineMsg(CuTest* tc, 
00070         const char* file, int line, const char* message, 
00071         double expected, double actual, double delta);
00072 void CuAssertPtrEquals_LineMsg(CuTest* tc, 
00073         const char* file, int line, const char* message, 
00074         void* expected, void* actual);
00075 
00076 /* public assert functions */
00077 
00078 #define CuFail(tc, ms)                        CuFail_Line(  (tc), __FILE__, __LINE__, NULL, (ms))
00079 #define CuAssert(tc, ms, cond)                CuAssert_Line((tc), __FILE__, __LINE__, (ms), (cond))
00080 #define CuAssertTrue(tc, cond)                CuAssert_Line((tc), __FILE__, __LINE__, "assert failed", (cond))
00081 
00082 #define CuAssertStrEquals(tc,ex,ac)           CuAssertStrEquals_LineMsg((tc),__FILE__,__LINE__,NULL,(ex),(ac))
00083 #define CuAssertStrEquals_Msg(tc,ms,ex,ac)    CuAssertStrEquals_LineMsg((tc),__FILE__,__LINE__,(ms),(ex),(ac))
00084 #define CuAssertIntEquals(tc,ex,ac)           CuAssertIntEquals_LineMsg((tc),__FILE__,__LINE__,NULL,(ex),(ac))
00085 #define CuAssertIntEquals_Msg(tc,ms,ex,ac)    CuAssertIntEquals_LineMsg((tc),__FILE__,__LINE__,(ms),(ex),(ac))
00086 #define CuAssertDblEquals(tc,ex,ac,dl)        CuAssertDblEquals_LineMsg((tc),__FILE__,__LINE__,NULL,(ex),(ac),(dl))
00087 #define CuAssertDblEquals_Msg(tc,ms,ex,ac,dl) CuAssertDblEquals_LineMsg((tc),__FILE__,__LINE__,(ms),(ex),(ac),(dl))
00088 #define CuAssertPtrEquals(tc,ex,ac)           CuAssertPtrEquals_LineMsg((tc),__FILE__,__LINE__,NULL,(ex),(ac))
00089 #define CuAssertPtrEquals_Msg(tc,ms,ex,ac)    CuAssertPtrEquals_LineMsg((tc),__FILE__,__LINE__,(ms),(ex),(ac))
00090 
00091 #define CuAssertPtrNotNull(tc,p)        CuAssert_Line((tc),__FILE__,__LINE__,"null pointer unexpected",(p != NULL))
00092 #define CuAssertPtrNotNullMsg(tc,msg,p) CuAssert_Line((tc),__FILE__,__LINE__,(msg),(p != NULL))

00094 /* CuSuite */
00095 
00096 #define MAX_TEST_CASES  1024
00097 
00098 #define SUITE_ADD_TEST(SUITE,TEST)      CuSuiteAdd(SUITE, CuTestNew(#TEST, TEST))
00099 
00100 typedef struct
00101 {
00102         int count;
00103         CuTest* list[MAX_TEST_CASES];
00104         int failCount;
00105 
00106 } CuSuite;
